name: Boomerang Man
overview: A shareware platformer by Simon Gustavsson and Karl-Magnus Johansson, published in 1994. An cute platformer in which you clear baddies from each screen while collecting as many fruit as you can for bonus points. Baddies usually take several hits and speed up after the first one. Your standard boomerang can be upgraded to a fireball with a powerup found in some of the levels. There is also an umbrella that lets you skip two of a total of 100 levels. Coded in AMOS and using AMOS stock sounds.
